fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.failed_count
fields.summary: Number of failed attempts for archiving WAL files

fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.archived_count
fields.summary: Number of WAL files that have been successfully archived

fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.stats_reset
fields.summary: Time at which these statistics were last reset

fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.last_archived_time
fields.summary: Time of the last successful archive operation

fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.last_failed_time
fields.summary: Time of the last failed archival operation

fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.last_failed_wal
fields.summary: Name of the WAL file of the last failed archival operation

fields.name: pg_stat_archiver.last_archived_wal
fields.summary: Name of the last WAL file successfully archived

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.buffers_backend
fields.summary: Number of buffers written directly by a backend

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.checkpoints_timed
fields.summary: Number of scheduled checkpoints that have been performed

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.buffers_alloc
fields.summary: Number of buffers allocated

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.buffers_clean
fields.summary: Number of buffers written by the background writer

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.buffers_backend_fsync
fields.summary: Number of times a backend had to execute its own fsync call (normally the background writer handles those even when the backend does its own write)

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.checkpoint_sync_time
fields.summary: "Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk, in milliseconds"

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.checkpoints_req
fields.summary: Number of requested checkpoints that have been performed

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.checkpoint_write_time
fields.summary: "Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk, in milliseconds"

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.maxwritten_clean
fields.summary: Number of times the background writer stopped a cleaning scan because it had written too many buffers

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.buffers_checkpoint
fields.summary: Number of buffers written during checkpoints

fields.name: pg_stat_bgwriter.stats_reset
fields.summary: Time at which these statistics were last reset

fields.name: pg_stat_database.numbackends
fields.summary: Number of backends currently connected to this database. This is the only column in this view that returns a value reflecting current state; all other columns return the accumulated values since the last reset.

fields.name: pg_stat_database.datname
fields.summary: Name of this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.blks_read
fields.summary: Number of disk blocks read in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.deadlocks
fields.summary: Number of deadlocks detected in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.tup_fetched
fields.summary: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.tup_updated
fields.summary: Number of rows updated by queries in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.stats_reset
fields.summary: Time at which these statistics were last reset

fields.name: pg_stat_database.tup_inserted
fields.summary: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.datid
fields.summary: OID of a database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.xact_commit
fields.summary: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

fields.name: pg_stat_database.tup_deleted
fields.summary: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.blk_read_time
fields.summary: "Time spent reading data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds"

fields.name: pg_stat_database.xact_rollback
fields.summary: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back

fields.name: pg_stat_database.conflicts
fields.summary: "Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details.)"

fields.name: pg_stat_database.blks_hit
fields.summary: "Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary (this only includes hits in the PostgreSQL buffer cache, not the operating system's file system cache)"

fields.name: pg_stat_database.tup_returned
fields.summary: Number of rows returned by queries in this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database.temp_files
fields.summary: "Number of temporary files created by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting."

fields.name: pg_stat_database.blk_write_time
fields.summary: "Time spent writing data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds"

fields.name: pg_stat_database.temp_bytes
fields.summary: "Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting."

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.datname
fields.summary: Name of this database

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.confl_deadlock
fields.summary: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to deadlocks

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.confl_bufferpin
fields.summary: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to pinned buffers

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.datid
fields.summary: OID of a database

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.confl_tablespace
fields.summary: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to dropped tablespaces

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.confl_lock
fields.summary: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to lock timeouts

fields.name: pg_stat_database_conflicts.confl_snapshot
fields.summary: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to old snapshots

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.indexrelid
fields.summary: OID of this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.relid
fields.summary: OID of the table for this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.indexrelname
fields.summary: Name of this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.relname
fields.summary: Name of the table for this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.idx_tup_fetch
fields.summary: Number of live table rows fetched by simple index scans using this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.idx_tup_read
fields.summary: Number of index entries returned by scans on this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.idx_scan
fields.summary: Number of index scans initiated on this index

fields.name: pg_stat_user_indexes.schemaname
fields.summary: Name of the schema this index is in

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.last_vacuum
fields.summary: Last time at which this table was manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_tup_ins
fields.summary: Number of rows inserted

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_dead_tup
fields.summary: Estimated number of dead rows

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.last_analyze
fields.summary: Last time at which this table was manually analyzed

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.idx_tup_fetch
fields.summary: Number of live rows fetched by index scans

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_tup_upd
fields.summary: Number of rows updated

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.schemaname
fields.summary: Name of the schema that this table is in

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.seq_tup_read
fields.summary: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.vacuum_count
fields.summary: Number of times this table has been manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_mod_since_analyze
fields.summary: Estimated number of rows modified since this table was last analyzed

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_tup_del
fields.summary: Number of rows deleted

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.last_autovacuum
fields.summary: Last time at which this table was vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.seq_scan
fields.summary: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.relid
fields.summary: OID of a table

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_tup_hot_upd
fields.summary: "Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required)"

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.autoanalyze_count
fields.summary: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.n_live_tup
fields.summary: Estimated number of live rows

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.relname
fields.summary: Name of this table

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.last_autoanalyze
fields.summary: Last time at which this table was analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.idx_scan
fields.summary: Number of index scans initiated on this table

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.autovacuum_count
fields.summary: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

fields.name: pg_stat_user_tables.analyze_count
fields.summary: Number of times this table has been manually analyzed

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.indexrelid
fields.summary: OID of this index

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.relid
fields.summary: OID of the table for this index

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.indexrelname
fields.summary: Name of this index

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.idx_blks_hit
fields.summary: Number of buffer hits in this index

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.relname
fields.summary: Name of the table for this index

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.idx_blks_read
fields.summary: Number of disk blocks read from this index

fields.name: pg_statio_user_indexes.schemaname
fields.summary: Name of the schema this index is in

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.relid
fields.summary: OID of a table

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.heap_blks_hit
fields.summary: Number of buffer hits in this table

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.tidx_blks_read
fields.summary: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table index (if any)

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.tidx_blks_hit
fields.summary: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table index (if any)

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.toast_blks_hit
fields.summary: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table (if any)

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.idx_blks_hit
fields.summary: Number of buffer hits in all indexes on this table

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.relname
fields.summary: Name of this table

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.toast_blks_read
fields.summary: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table (if any)

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.idx_blks_read
fields.summary: Number of disk blocks read from all indexes on this table

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.schemaname
fields.summary: Name of the schema that this table is in

fields.name: pg_statio_user_tables.heap_blks_read
fields.summary: Number of disk blocks read from this table
